content_descriptors.notes:
In the opening section, the main character jumps from a great height, suggesting an extreme choice. However, this is not an affirmation or celebration of her choice, but rather a reflection of the harsh life she has led.
She is also given a chance to avoid that outcome as she progresses through the game.

name: ENTANGLED SOULS Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows7
  • Processor: Core i5 7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: Core i5-10200H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
